scripts.dev:all: pnpm dlx concurrently -k -n api,web -c blue,green "pnpm run dev:api" "pnpm -C web dev"
scripts.test:e2e:open: node scripts/poll-url.js $CYPRESS_API_HEALTH_URL 200 60 || true && node scripts/poll-url.js $CYPRESS_BASE_URL 200 60 || true && pnpm exec cypress open --config-file e2e/cypress.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:run: node scripts/poll-url.js $CYPRESS_API_HEALTH_URL 200 60 || true && node scripts/poll-url.js $CYPRESS_BASE_URL 200 60 || true && pnpm exec cypress run --config-file e2e/cypress.config.ts
scripts.stop:all: echo 'Implement stopping processes by PID/port if desired'
